channel.title: APIs on PlaceOS
channel.description: Recent content in APIs on PlaceOS

item.title: API Keys: Simplify Authentication for Apps & Devices
item.description: Simplify app integration with PlaceOS API Keys. Enable secure, authenticated server-to-server interactions, unattended panel access, and auto-login.

item.title: Webinar: Campus Management Systems with Cisco Meraki
item.description: Learn how campus management systems leverage occupancy data like Cisco Meraki so that you’re not powering empty classrooms on campus.

item.title: How BMS Improve Commercial Building Sustainability
item.description: Explore new integrations that enhance ESG and sustainability in commercial buildings. Achieve your energy reduction goals and sustainability targets today!

item.title: How to Successfully Return to the Office after Covid
item.description: Discover best practices for returning to the office after COVID. Explore how to create a safe and productive work environment in our comprehensive guide.

item.title: Self Documenting API
item.description: Learn about the benefits of a self-documenting API for seamless integration and enhanced efficiency.

item.title: Deployment Tooling: Kubernetes
item.description: Our new deployment tooling will help you get up and running with speed and security at the forefront.

item.title: How to create a workplace worth returning to
item.description: In this piece, I’m going to discuss how the working environment has changed today and what you can do about it.

item.title: Unlocking your workplace’s hidden potential with Cisco Meraki
item.description: Creating a digital workplace can be like opening a mixed bag of technologies, tools, and systems that all tend to operate in
